name: ExtensionUKCoreNHSCommunication
title: Extension UK Core NHS Communication
description: An extension to support the communication preferences for an individual.
purpose: This extension has been developed to support the communication preferences for a resource in the NHS.

element.short: NHS communication preferences for a resource
element.definition: Communication preferences including a list of Languages which may be used for communication.
